name: Blynk_Esp8266AT_WM
description: Simple WiFiManager for Blynk and Mega, SAM DUE, SAMD21, SAMD51, nRF52, STM32, etc. boards running ESP8266/ESP32-AT shields, configuration data saved in EEPROM, SAMD EEPROM-emulated FlashStorage, SAM-DUE DueFlashStorage or nRF52 LittleFS
keywords: sensors, control, device, smartphone, mobile, app, web, cloud, communication, protocol, iot, m2m, wifi, ble, bluetooth, ethernet, usb, serial, gsm, gprs, 3g, data, esp8266, esp32, http
